messages.title: To shape an economy for everyone
messages.content: To build homes and put power back in your hands through citizen's democracy.

messages.title: We stand for our future
messages.content: Stand with us for housing, NHS, environment and schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building an economy for everyone's needs with sustainable, affordable homes.
Putting power back in the hands of citizens through democratic means.
Ensuring the NHS is in the hands of the people.
Commitment to environmental stewardship and maintaining standards in schools.

issues.economy: Building an economy for everyone's needs with sustainable, affordable homes.
issues.governance: Putting power back in the hands of citizens through democratic means.
issues.health: Ensuring the NHS is in the hands of the people.

housing.content: To build homes and put power back in your hands through citizen's democracy.

leaflet.personalStatement: This election isn't about the next five years. It's about the next fifty years.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote Green on 8th June for what matters.
